Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer said, “I will not certify the vote in my state for Donald Trump, no matter the outcome."
Lack enough support: There is no evidence or support found to confirm that Gov. Whitmer made the statement mentioned in the claim.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Gov. Whitmer vowed to meddle in the presidential election if Joe Biden doesn't win, which is not supported by any evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the quote attributed to Gov. Whitmer is false and she did not say it.
